passage_text: The average salary for assistant manager journeys jobs is $36,000.

Average Journeys hourly pay ranges from approximately $7.35 per hour for Sales Representative to $14.00 per hour for Store Manager. The average Journeys salary ranges from approximately $16,400 per year for Retail Sales Associate to $105,000 per year for District Manager. Salary information comes from 322 data points collected directly from employees, users, and jobs on Indeed.

Depends on the region I suppose. As a Journeys Store Manager I made $250 a week salary plus 10% commission and a percentage of the store monthly. It also depends on how much you and your team sell. My checks (bi-weekly) were anywhere from $650 to $850 usually, sometimes more during peak holidays.

Average Assistant Manager Journeys Salaries. The average salary for assistant manager journeys jobs is $36,000. Average assistant manager journeys salaries can vary greatly due to company, location, industry, experience and benefits.

For example the median expected annual pay for a typical Retail Store Manager Assistant in the United States is $40,243, so 50% of the people who perform the job of Retail Store Manager Assistant in the United States are expected to make less than $40,243.
